name: Splice
storyline:
Sam Foster is the new kid in security team for CyroArk, a scientific research company. His first week is spend at a research bunker underneath the Arizona desert. All has gone well so far, but he has learned something about this company that he wishes he knew beforehand. The company is conducting illegal DNA splicing experiments on human subjects and has now been threatened with his life if he decides to leave or reveal the secret.

Then, something unexpected happens. An experiment has escaped. Screams and the sounds of ripping flesh can be heard from Sam's security office. Something terrifying has broken free.

As a result, a security lockdown has been triggered, and the only way to reset it is to reboot the mainframe. But that means facing what is out there, the creature that has seemingly killed everyone remaining in the bunker.

Three days have passed since the lockdown. Sam hasn't left the safety of his security room. His supplies have been vanquished. It is time face his fears and plan his escape.
summary: A security job gone wrong. Now you are trapped with something deep inside an underground research bunker, and you are all that is left. Can you overcome your fear in this escape room horror?
